summary: Build a Tema Port berthing page UI that displays port marine assets (tugboats) and infrastructure data as card-based, grouped sections, replacing existing selected sections.
architectural_notes: UI sections should support full replacement with data-driven card layouts.
Infrastructure UI should render grouped sections by category with structured cards per item.

existing_features.title: In the Berthing page content area, replace the UI content rendered under both selected elements (`/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]` and `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]`) with a structured display of the provided `infrastructure` object, grouped by category and rendered as card-based sections.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace the selected section with cards showing all available tugboats from provided Tema Port data.
Replace both selected elements with the full infrastructure object displayed as structured cards grouped by category (terminal_3_mps, main_harbour_quays, specialized_industrial, tema_shipyard).

projectName: Replace selected Berthing page sections with grouped infrastructure cards
